Our Services

Authentic African & Korean fusion experiences across multiple service offerings

Catering & Events

Full-service catering for weddings, corporate events, and private parties.

We provide authentic African-Korean fusion catering for embassies, festivals, corporate events, and private parties across Busan and Yangsan. Our experienced team handles everything from setup to service, ensuring your event is memorable.

Cooking Classes

Learn the art of African & Fusion cuisine with our expert chefs.

Join our hands-on cooking classes where you'll learn traditional techniques and modern fusion approaches. From basic knife skills to mastering complex flavors, our classes cater to all skill levels.

Grocery Market

Shop authentic ingredients to recreate our flavors at home.

Find authentic African ingredients, spices, and specialty items sourced directly from producers. Our grocery section ensures you can recreate our unique flavors in your own kitchen with high-quality, genuine products.

Ready to Experience Our Services?

Contact us today to book your catering event, join a cooking class, or explore our grocery selection.
